featured_resource.title: Routing in the Cloud: Connecting the Dots in a Microservices Architecture

resources_page.title: Resources
resources_page.meta_description: Learn more about Traefik, Traefik Mesh, Traefik Enterprise, and explore our white papers, webinars, videos and more.

node.title: Creating (k8s) workshop environments with Traefik using GitOps
node.excerpt: In this presentation, Lucas Käldström teaches how to create a a dedicated web-based Kubernetes 'portal', including using GitOps with Flux, Ingress Routing with Traefik, DNS setup with external-dns, VS Code running in the browser with code-server, and the cloud-hosted setup.
node.custom_excerpt: In this presentation, Lucas Käldström teaches how to create a a dedicated web-based Kubernetes 'portal', including using GitOps with Flux, Ingress Routing with Traefik, DNS setup with external-dns, VS Code running in the browser with code-server, and the cloud-hosted setup.

node.title: Plugin to Traefik: Create and Publish Your Own Middleware
node.excerpt: In this meetup, Kevin discusses Traefik Plugins and how to build your custom middleware. Learn how to develop a plugin using Go, test it locally in development mode, how to publish the plugin on the Traefik Pilot marketplace, and how to deploy the new plugin onto a production system.
node.custom_excerpt: In this meetup, Kevin discusses Traefik Plugins and how to build your custom middleware. Learn how to develop a plugin using Go, test it locally in development mode, how to publish the plugin on the Traefik Pilot marketplace, and how to deploy the new plugin onto a production system.

node.title: Kubernetes, Ingress and Traefik Usage at CERN
node.excerpt: This talk describes multiple use cases for containers and Kubernetes at CERN with details on how they use Traefik as the default ingress controller.
node.custom_excerpt: This talk describes multiple use cases for containers and Kubernetes at CERN with details on how they use Traefik as the default ingress controller.

node.title: Access Policy at the Network Layer: Using Open Policy Agent with Traefik for Safer, more Manageable Security Policy
node.excerpt: This session by Weaveworks covers common design patterns Kubernetes cluster operators use to address application level policies, and defines when and why to use each type.
node.custom_excerpt: This session by Weaveworks covers common design patterns Kubernetes cluster operators use to address application level policies, and defines when and why to use each type.

node.title: Storage Demos are Boring When You Can't See the App
node.excerpt: Learn how Pure Storage, the company which develops all-flash data storage hardware and software products, is able to showcase complex enterprise-level technical demos which utilize Container Storage as a Service reliably with the use of Traefik as an Ingress controller for Kubernetes.
node.custom_excerpt: Learn how Pure Storage, the company which develops all-flash data storage hardware and software products, is able to showcase complex enterprise-level technical demos which utilize Container Storage as a Service reliably with the use of Traefik as an Ingress controller for Kubernetes.

node.title: Managing Traffic Everywhere: Bare Metal to Containers to the Public Cloud
node.excerpt: Join us as Phil Fenstermacher, Lead Linux engineer at William & Mary, demos how they are using Traefik to manage William & Mary’s infrastructure.
node.custom_excerpt: Join us as Phil Fenstermacher, Lead Linux engineer at William & Mary, demos how they are using Traefik to manage William & Mary’s infrastructure.

node.title: Tweaking Requests with Traefik Middlewares
node.excerpt: There are several middlewares available in Traefik. During this webinar, we go through Traefik's middlewares, and shows how to reduce software development costs, in a live demo of the middlewares in action.
node.custom_excerpt: There are several middlewares available in Traefik. During this webinar, we go through Traefik's middlewares, and shows how to reduce software development costs, in a live demo of the middlewares in action.

node.title: Traefik 2.x Features
node.excerpt: Traefik and MSHOWTO Webinar Series, Part II, demonstrates how to use Traefik running on a Kubernetes cluster to improve release cycles using canary deployments, and offers a live demo of deploying Traefik on K3s.
node.custom_excerpt: Traefik and MSHOWTO Webinar Series, Part II, demonstrates how to use Traefik running on a Kubernetes cluster to improve release cycles using canary deployments, and offers a live demo of deploying Traefik on K3s.

node.title: Traefik Migration 1.7 to 2.x
node.excerpt: Traefik and MSHOWTO Webinar Series, Part I, demonstrates walking through a deployed application with Traefik running, upgrading the labels to the 2.x format, and how to deploy the application to Traefik 2.x.
node.custom_excerpt: Traefik and MSHOWTO Webinar Series, Part I, demonstrates walking through a deployed application with Traefik running, upgrading the labels to the 2.x format, and how to deploy the application to Traefik 2.x.

node.title: How to Discover and Expose ECS Services Automatically in a Live ECS Cluster Using Traefik
node.excerpt: Vikas Kumar, Sr. Cloud Architect at Rackspace, demonstrates the way Traefik simplifies managing the lifecycle of ECS service discovery, without any extra AWS resources.
node.custom_excerpt: Vikas Kumar, Sr. Cloud Architect at Rackspace, demonstrates the way Traefik simplifies managing the lifecycle of ECS service discovery, without any extra AWS resources.

node.title: Easily Deploy the Reaction Commerce Platform from Mailchimp with Traefik 2 on Digital Ocean
node.excerpt: This presentation provides a guided tour of how to deploy Reaction Commerce’s core services: Core API, Admin UI, Storefront, OAuth 2 Server and Identity Provider on Digital Ocean, from Mailchimp with Traefik 2.
node.custom_excerpt: This presentation provides a guided tour of how to deploy Reaction Commerce’s core services: Core API, Admin UI, Storefront, OAuth 2 Server and Identity Provider on Digital Ocean, from Mailchimp with Traefik 2.

node.title: Cloud Native Tools for Developers by OpenFaaS
node.excerpt: In this Traefik Online Meetup, Alex Ellis, Founder of OpenFaaS, and Alistair Hey, from the OpenFaaS community, will show you how to bootstrap a Kubernetes cluster the easy way. The session includes an overview of the OSS tooling, and how you can use each one.
node.custom_excerpt: In this Traefik Online Meetup, Alex Ellis, Founder of OpenFaaS, and Alistair Hey, from the OpenFaaS community, will show you how to bootstrap a Kubernetes cluster the easy way. The session includes an overview of the OSS tooling, and how you can use each one.

node.title: Escaping Big Tech With Traefik 2.0 by WP Engine
node.excerpt: In this Online Meetup, Chris Wiegman covers how to utilize Traefik and Docker for self-hosting solutions such as Nextcloud, Wallabag and others to build a secure and stable alternative to big-tech ecosystems.
node.custom_excerpt: In this Online Meetup, Chris Wiegman covers how to utilize Traefik and Docker for self-hosting solutions such as Nextcloud, Wallabag and others to build a secure and stable alternative to big-tech ecosystems.

node.title: Leveraging Traefik for a Highly Available Ingress Controller on Docker Enterprise by StackRox
node.excerpt: In this Online Meetup, Andy Clemenko talks about some of the tips and tricks for deploying Traefik in a highly available configuration, and demo scenarios which showcase these.
node.custom_excerpt: In this Online Meetup, Andy Clemenko talks about some of the tips and tricks for deploying Traefik in a highly available configuration, and demo scenarios which showcase these.

node.title: Providing High Available AI Assistant with Traefik + Rasa + Docker
node.excerpt: This presentation shows how to set up a highly available Rasa AI Assistant on a Docker Swarm Cluster using Traefik 2.x as Load Balancer.
node.custom_excerpt: This presentation shows how to set up a highly available Rasa AI Assistant on a Docker Swarm Cluster using Traefik 2.x as Load Balancer.

node.title: 5 Ways to Level Up your Developer Powers with Traefik by Data Machines
node.excerpt: This online meetup walks through five real world examples in which Dr. Rion Dooley from Data Machines uses Traefik for more effective application development and deployment
node.custom_excerpt: This online meetup walks through five real world examples in which Dr. Rion Dooley from Data Machines uses Traefik for more effective application development and deployment

node.title: Container Orchestration with Traefik 2.x with Cometari Solutions
node.excerpt: Jakub Hajek shares how Cometari Solutions uses Traefik on a daily basis, managed by Docker Swarm
node.custom_excerpt: Jakub Hajek shares how Cometari Solutions uses Traefik on a daily basis, managed by Docker Swarm

node.title: Practice of eXtreme DevOps with Traefik
node.excerpt: Practice of eXtreme DevOps with Traefik presented by James Pic, CTO, YourLabs.
node.custom_excerpt: Practice of eXtreme DevOps with Traefik presented by James Pic, CTO, YourLabs.

node.title: Moving to Microservice Architecture Using Traefik, for Fast and Low Risk Deployment
node.excerpt: Les Tilleuls Coop use the power of Docker Swarm orchestration and Traefik service management to be able to deploy easily and iterate as fast as possible.
node.custom_excerpt: Les Tilleuls Coop use the power of Docker Swarm orchestration and Traefik service management to be able to deploy easily and iterate as fast as possible.

node.title: Reducing Cloud Costs, Improving Flexibility, and Providing Resiliency with Traefik
node.excerpt: At Virginia Tech, Traefik has been used in numerous ways to benefit development, and deployment of containerized workloads. But, two use cases have been fairly unique, and we're excited to show them off to you in this session!
node.custom_excerpt: At Virginia Tech, Traefik has been used in numerous ways to benefit development, and deployment of containerized workloads. But, two use cases have been fairly unique, and we're excited to show them off to you in this session!

node.title: Deploy, Configure, and Monitor Traefik with Prometheus and Grafana by Brian Christner, 56K.Cloud
node.excerpt: In this session, Brian walks through how to gather metrics from Traefik and scrape them with Prometheus and visualize the metrics in Grafana. Why should we enable Traefik metrics? Monitoring provides observability not only to Traefik but the workloads which Traefik is managing.
node.custom_excerpt: In this session, Brian walks through how to gather metrics from Traefik and scrape them with Prometheus and visualize the metrics in Grafana. Why should we enable Traefik metrics? Monitoring provides observability not only to Traefik but the workloads which Traefik is managing.

node.title: Container DevOps with Azure DevOps and Traefik by 10th Magnitude
node.excerpt: Colin Dembovsky from 10th Magnitude goes over a journey of Container DevOps, and how Traefik is a key enabler for good Container DevOps.
node.custom_excerpt: Colin Dembovsky from 10th Magnitude goes over a journey of Container DevOps, and how Traefik is a key enabler for good Container DevOps.

node.title: Rocket.Chat on Amazon EKS with Traefik by Rocket.Chat
node.excerpt: This Online Meetup features how Rocket.Chat is using Traefik with Amazon Elastic Container Service for Kubernetes (EKS)
node.custom_excerpt: This Online Meetup features how Rocket.Chat is using Traefik with Amazon Elastic Container Service for Kubernetes (EKS)

node.title: Scale your TLS-ized APIs with Kubernetes Ingress by Wandera
node.excerpt: Jakub Coufal from Wondera demonstrates the benefits of configuring ExternalDNS, Cert-manager, Traefik and Prometheus with HPA from an operational perspective, while allowing developers to easily deploy ingresses without the hassle of cluster-specific configurations.
node.custom_excerpt: Jakub Coufal from Wondera demonstrates the benefits of configuring ExternalDNS, Cert-manager, Traefik and Prometheus with HPA from an operational perspective, while allowing developers to easily deploy ingresses without the hassle of cluster-specific configurations.

node.title: HolidayCheck Cloud Platform Using Traefik
node.excerpt: Periklis Tsirakidis from HolidayCheck shows how they shaped Traefik to fit into HolidayCheck's platform, and how it serves to standardize and empower continuous delivery in a Kubernetes agnostic way for HolidayCheck's product teams
node.custom_excerpt: Periklis Tsirakidis from HolidayCheck shows how they shaped Traefik to fit into HolidayCheck's platform, and how it serves to standardize and empower continuous delivery in a Kubernetes agnostic way for HolidayCheck's product teams

node.title: Real Life Examples from Rookout to Optimize your Traefik Onboarding Experience
node.excerpt: Watch a step by step guide on how to install Traefik on Kubernetes, combine Traefik with your CI to deploy dev environments, route traffic by HTTP headers, and turn your Kubernetes cluster into a VPN
node.custom_excerpt: Watch a step by step guide on how to install Traefik on Kubernetes, combine Traefik with your CI to deploy dev environments, route traffic by HTTP headers, and turn your Kubernetes cluster into a VPN

node.title: RiksTV's Cloud Infrastructure Using Traefik
node.excerpt: In this online meetup, Trond Hindenes from RiksTV shows how Traefik fits into RiksTVs stack, and how it fits together with other products such as ALB, Kubernetes and Consul.
node.custom_excerpt: In this online meetup, Trond Hindenes from RiksTV shows how Traefik fits into RiksTVs stack, and how it fits together with other products such as ALB, Kubernetes and Consul.
